titles.title: We Are Washed In The Blood

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the soul-cleansing blood (Jesus Christ, Lord and King,) of the Lamb. (What a glorious name!){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our new garments are spotless, (Lord, we love You, adore You,){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}They are white as snow; (We will praise Your name){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are washed in the blood (Forever washed in the blood) of the Lamb. (Of the Lamb){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
